channel.title: iClarity v2.0 - Old-Style brought back to life
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/iClaritylogo.png[/img]
[size=12pt][U][B]Introduction[/B][/U][/size] This server is revision 317. iClarity, in the past, has been known for being a PKing server with near-to-perfect combat. Once again, I hope to achieve this and much more. iClarity v2.0 will be spread across the whole world of Gielinor. This is because I hope to recreate Runescape and it's aspects back in '06-'07. This server will not contain any items past mid '06 (No godswords, no crossbows, no dragon claws and no PvP items). I plan to perfect everything that iClarity will contain - minigames, combat, skills, quests, etc. Of course, the Client will play it's part too. I have been working on the Client a lot before I begun this project - it has full updating, full cache downloading, several new animations (None that are irrelevant to the 'old-school' factor), a couple new interfaces and many other features. Also with the client, I have created a new login-box and background since the last version.
[size=12pt][U][B]What makes iClarity stand out from all other servers?[/B][/U][/size] iClarity is going to be programmed in the best possible way, taking into account all ways of doing each feature. I am going to be perfecting [U][B]each and every[/B][/U] feature before moving onto the next. As PKing/combat is most people's favourite part of a server, the combat in iClarity will be exceptional and flawless. It has been near to this in the previous versions however there were several bugs and glitches. This time almost everything is being cleared out and then rewritten from scratch.
[size=12pt][U][B]AIMS[/B][/U][/size]
[color=orange][U][b]Combat:[/b][/U][/COLOR] NOTE: When combat is finished, I may be hosting the server for the community to test combat. When the server is finished the combat experience rate will be 10-25x Runescape's rate.
[ul][li]Perfect PvP, PvN and NvP combat.[/li] [li]Full magic with almost all spells functional. This includes the correct 'freezing' timers, delays etc.[/li] [li]Optimum Ranging - I hope to perfect each ranged weapon. These include knives, shortbows, longbows, Karil's X bow and the Dark bow. The projectiles will be perfected.[/li] [li]Perfect Melee, ranged and magic following (Clipped).[/li] [li]All special attacks working perfectly, with all effects.[/li][/ul]
[color=orange][U][b]Skills:[/b][/U][/COLOR]
[ul][li]All skills will be created apart from the following: Farming; Agility; Possibly smithing (I am yet to decide).[/li] [li]Every skill that is created will be perfected. This is usually why I take a long time to create a server, as I want to perfect each aspect before moving onto the next.[/li] [li]Skillcapes will be available to purchase once you have mastered a skill (Level 99).[/li][/ul]
[color=orange][U][b]Minigames:[/b][/U][/COLOR] The Minigames I am aiming to create are:
[ul][li]Barrows - With each brother perfect, a random crypt being the tunnel entrance and fully working doors in the tunnel.[/li] [li]Fight Cave - It is yet to be decided whether I create every full wave, or a smaller amount of waves.[/li] [li]Duel Arena - This will be the place to test your PKing/combat skills. Stake money or have fun fights with your friends.[/li] [li]Pest Control - This will be FULL; the NPC's will attack the void knight (Not all of them, some will attack the players) and the portals will go down after a certain period of time.[/li] [li]Custom minigames may be implemented.[/li][/ul]
[color=orange][U][b]Quests:[/b][/U][/COLOR] The Quests I am aiming to create are:
[ul][li]Lost city.[/li] [li]Desert treasure.[/li] [li]Dragon slayer.[/li] [li]Rune mysteries.[/li] [li]Mage arena (Miniquest).[/li] [li]The curse of Zaros (Miniquest).[/li] [li]Dark mage Runecrafting (Miniquest).[/li][/ul]
[size=12pt][U][B]Updates[/B][/U][/size]
[U]18th February 2010[/U] - Fully working prayer with perfect draining, headicons and switching. - When equipping a shield whilst wielding a 2 handed sword, your 2h weapon will be removed and the shield will be equipped. Works the other way round as well.
[U]15th February 2010[/U] - New client background. - Client JFrame theme changed. - Cursor menu removed from the client. - Quality of the login box is now perfect. - New login button.
[U]14th February 2010[/U] - Minor bug with weapon attack animations fixed. - Client icon bug fixed. - Equipment bonuses are now set onto the new Equipment interface. - All emotes on the emote interface now work. - Work on prayer has begun (Prayer draining, basic turning on/off prayers - no prayer switching yet). - Special bar bug fixed - Wasn't changing colour of the "S P E C I A L A T T A C K" text when switching the special attack on/off. - Second hit mask working perfectly now - It was hitting the same as the first hit mask before. - Food eating added for almost all food items. - New items now equip in the correct equipment slots (E.G. torso, defenders, skillcapes etc). - Minor packet lag is now fixed (Was messing up the general process of the player). - Some special attacks added to combat (These are the dds, dragon longsword, dragon scimitar and dragon mace). - Correct attack style interfaces added (Before it showed the same one for each weapon). - Combat now resets when equipping/un-equipping items. - Each player now gains 10 special power every 30 seconds (Same as RuneScape).
[U]12th February 2010[/U] - Special bar sending and updating is now complete.
[U]8th February 2010[/U] - Created the perfect 420 equipment interface.
[U]7th February 2010[/U] - Basic combat created. Only contains melee at the moment. - Added most stand, walk, run, attack and block animations. - Fixed a bug with resetting following. - Second hit mask created and is fully functional. - Fixed a client side bug that was messing up the equipment screen interface.
[U]6th February 2010[/U] - Minor shop item buying glitch fixed. - Setting the amount of the equipment onto the player equipment interface is now fixed. - Item dropping and item picking up packets created. - When you close the banking interface, after having 'withdraw as note' on, if you bank again you will withdraw items un-noted. - Clothes types now load from the character file.
[U]5th February 2010[/U] - Dialogue system created. - Player damage created.
[U]3rd February 2010[/U] - Majour NPC updating glitch fixed - this held me back as I had been trying to fix this for about a week.
[size=12pt][U][B]Media (Videos/Images)[/B][/U][/size]
[U]Fully working Prayer with perfect draining, headicons and switching[/U] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dx1HZi5Xrdw
[U]Clipped Following[/U] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G75t29Imj2Q]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G75t29Imj2Q[/url]
[U]Perfect equipment removing when wielding a shield/2h weapon[/U] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/EquipmentRemoving.gif[/img]
[U]Perfect 459 Equipment Interface[/U]
iClarity's: [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/EquipmentScreen-1.png[/img]
Runescape's original 459/474 one: [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/kreeinvla4.jpg[/img]
[u]Client BackGround[/u] [img]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/iClarityBackGround-1.png[/img]
[U]Client[/U] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/Client-3.png[/img]

item.title: iClarity v2.0 - Old-Style brought back to life
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Updates for this morning and yesterday:

15th February 2010

  • New client background.
  • Client JFrame theme changed.
  • Cursor menu removed from the client.
  • Quality of the login box is now perfect.
  • New login button.

14th February 2010

  • Minor bug with weapon attack animations fixed.
  • Client icon bug fixed.
  • Equipment bonuses are now set onto the new Equipment interface.
  • All emotes on the emote interface now work.
  • Work on prayer has begun (Prayer draining, basic turning on/off prayers - no prayer switching yet).
  • Special bar bug fixed - Wasn’t changing colour of the “S P E C I A L A T T A C K” text when switching the special attack on/off.
  • Second hit mask working perfectly now - It was hitting the same as the first hit mask before.
  • Food eating added for almost all food items.
  • New items now equip in the correct equipment slots (E.G. torso, defenders, skillcapes etc).
  • Minor packet lag is now fixed (Was messing up the general process of the player).
  • Some special attacks added to combat (These are the dds, dragon longsword, dragon scimitar and dragon mace).
  • When equipping a shield whilst wielding a 2 handed sword, your 2h weapon will be removed and the shield will be equipped. Works the other way round as well.
  • Correct attack style interfaces added (Before it showed the same one for each weapon).
  • Combat now resets when equipping/un-equipping items.
  • Each player now gains 10 special power every 30 seconds (Same as RuneScape).

A video of the combat will be coming soon. There is currently only melee in the combat, however it’s near to perfect.

New Client BackGround

iClarityBackGround-1.png766×503

Client

Client-3.png786×615

Read full topic

item.title: iClarity v2.0 - Old-Style brought back to life
item.dc:creator: @my_stoof my stoof
item.description:
@my_stoof wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:1, topic:328685”]

[size=12pt]Introduction[/size]
This server is revision 317.
iClarity, in the past, has been known for being a PKing server with near-to-perfect combat. Once again, I hope to achieve this and much more. iClarity v2.0 will be spread across the whole world of Gielinor. This is because I hope to recreate Runescape and it’s aspects back in '06-'07. This server will not contain any items past mid '06 (No godswords, no crossbows, no dragon claws and no PvP items). I plan to perfect everything that iClarity will contain - minigames, combat, skills, quests, etc. Of course, the Client will play it’s part too. I have been working on the Client a lot before I begun this project - it has full updating, full cache downloading, several new animations (None that are irrelevant to the ‘old-school’ factor), a couple new interfaces and many other features. Also with the client, I have created a new login-box and background since the last version.

[size=12pt]What makes iClarity stand out from all other servers?[/size]
iClarity is going to be programmed in the best possible way, taking into account all ways of doing each feature. I am going to be perfecting each and every feature before moving onto the next. As PKing/combat is most people’s favourite part of a server, the combat in iClarity will be exceptional and flawless. It has been near to this in the previous versions however there were several bugs and glitches. This time almost everything is being cleared out and then rewritten from scratch.

[size=12pt]AIMS[/size]

[color=orange]Combat:[/COLOR]
NOTE: When combat is finished, I may be hosting the server for the community to test combat. When the server is finished the combat experience rate will be 10-25x Runescape’s rate.

[ul][li]Perfect PvP, PvN and NvP combat.[/li]
[li]Full magic with almost all spells functional. This includes the correct ‘freezing’ timers, delays etc.[/li]
[li]Optimum Ranging - I hope to perfect each ranged weapon. These include knives, shortbows, longbows, Karil’s X bow and the Dark bow. The projectiles will be perfected.[/li]
[li]Perfect Melee, ranged and magic following (Clipped).[/li]
[li]All special attacks working perfectly, with all effects.[/li][/ul]

[color=orange]Skills:[/COLOR]

[ul][li]All skills will be created apart from the following: Farming; Agility; Possibly smithing (I am yet to decide).[/li]
[li]Every skill that is created will be perfected. This is usually why I take a long time to create a server, as I want to perfect each aspect before moving onto the next.[/li]
[li]Skillcapes will be available to purchase once you have mastered a skill (Level 99).[/li][/ul]

[color=orange]Minigames:[/COLOR]
The Minigames I am aiming to create are:

[ul][li]Barrows - With each brother perfect, a random crypt being the tunnel entrance and fully working doors in the tunnel.[/li]
[li]Fight Cave - It is yet to be decided whether I create every full wave, or a smaller amount of waves.[/li]
[li]Duel Arena - This will be the place to test your PKing/combat skills. Stake money or have fun fights with your friends.[/li]
[li]Pest Control - This will be FULL; the NPC’s will attack the void knight (Not all of them, some will attack the players) and the portals will go down after a certain period of time.[/li]
[li]Custom minigames may be implemented.[/li][/ul]

[color=orange]Quests:[/COLOR]
The Quests I am aiming to create are:

[ul][li]Lost city.[/li]
[li]Desert treasure.[/li]
[li]Dragon slayer.[/li]
[li]Rune mysteries.[/li]
[li]Mage arena (Miniquest).[/li]
[li]The curse of Zaros (Miniquest).[/li]
[li]Dark mage Runecrafting (Miniquest).[/li][/ul]

[size=12pt]Updates[/size]

8th February 2010

  • Created the perfect 420 equipment interface.

7th February 2010

  • Basic combat created. Only contains melee at the moment.
  • Special bar sending and updating is now complete.
  • Added most stand, walk, run, attack and block animations.
  • Fixed a bug with resetting following.
  • Second hit mask created and is fully functional.
  • Fixed a client side bug that was messing up the equipment screen interface.

6th February 2010

  • Minor shop item buying glitch fixed.
  • Setting the amount of the equipment onto the player equipment interface is now fixed.
  • Item dropping and item picking up packets created.
  • When you close the banking interface, after having ‘withdraw as note’ on, if you bank again you will withdraw items un-noted.
  • Clothes types now load from the character file.

5th February 2010

  • Dialogue system created.
  • Player damage created.

3rd February 2010

  • Majour NPC updating glitch fixed - this held me back as I had been trying to fix this for about a week.

[size=12pt]Media (Videos/Images)[/size]

Clipped Following

Client

Perfect 420 Equipment Interface

iClarity’s:

Runescape’s original 420 one:
[/quote]

Read full topic
